snippet: A son’s illness overshadowed all of the other challenges facing a family of Haitian immigrants trying to make a new home in America.
abstract: Catholic Charities helps Paul Eddy of Queens pay back rent while he and his wife struggle to pay medical bills for a son's illness.
lead_paragraph: A son’s illness overshadowed all of the other challenges facing a family of Haitian immigrants trying to make a new home in America.

headline.print_headline: A Survivor of Haiti’s Quake, and Now of Leukemia, Too
